sources.name: pivoteddata
sources.script:
source(output(
		{Country Name} as string,
		{Country Code} as string,
		{Indicator Name} as string,
		{Indicator Code} as string,
		{1960} as string,
		{1961} as string,
		{1962} as string,
		{1963} as string,
		{1964} as string,
		{1965} as string,
		{1966} as string,
		{1967} as string,
		{1968} as string,
		{1969} as string,
		{1970} as string,
		{1971} as string,
		{1972} as string,
		{1973} as string,
		{1974} as string,
		{1975} as string,
		{1976} as string,
		{1977} as string,
		{1978} as string,
		{1979} as string,
		{1980} as string,
		{1981} as string,
		{1982} as string,
		{1983} as string,
		{1984} as string,
		{1985} as string,
		{1986} as string,
		{1987} as string,
		{1988} as string,
		{1989} as string,
		{1990} as string,
		{1991} as string,
		{1992} as string,
		{1993} as string,
		{1994} as string,
		{1995} as string,
		{1996} as string,
		{1997} as string,
		{1998} as string,
		{1999} as string,
		{2000} as string,
		{2001} as string,
		{2002} as string,
		{2003} as string,
		{2004} as string,
		{2005} as string,
		{2006} as string,
		{2007} as string,
		{2008} as string,
		{2009} as string,
		{2010} as string,
		{2011} as string,
		{2012} as string,
		{2013} as string,
		{2014} as string,
		{2015} as string,
		{2016} as string,
		{2017} as string,
		{2018} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	query: 'SELECT [Country Name]\n      ,[Country Code]\n      ,[Indicator Name]\n      ,[Indicator Code]\n      ,[1960]\n      ,[1961]\n      ,[1962]\n      ,[1963]\n      ,[1964]\n      ,[1965]\n      ,[1966]\n      ,[1967]\n      ,[1968]\n      ,[1969]\n      ,[1970]\n      ,[1971]\n      ,[1972]\n      ,[1973]\n      ,[1974]\n      ,[1975]\n      ,[1976]\n      ,[1977]\n      ,[1978]\n      ,[1979]\n      ,[1980]\n      ,[1981]\n      ,[1982]\n      ,[1983]\n      ,[1984]\n      ,[1985]\n      ,[1986]\n      ,[1987]\n      ,[1988]\n      ,[1989]\n      ,[1990]\n      ,[1991]\n      ,[1992]\n      ,[1993]\n      ,[1994]\n      ,[1995]\n      ,[1996]\n      ,[1997]\n      ,[1998]\n      ,[1999]\n      ,[2000]\n      ,[2001]\n      ,[2002]\n      ,[2003]\n      ,[2004]\n      ,[2005]\n      ,[2006]\n      ,[2007]\n      ,[2008]\n      ,[2009]\n      ,[2010]\n      ,[2011]\n      ,[2012]\n      ,[2013]\n      ,[2014]\n      ,[2015]\n      ,[2016]\n      ,[2017]\n      ,[2018]\n  FROM [staging].[WorldBankPopulation_untyped]',
	format: 'query') ~> pivoteddata

sinks.name: WorldBankPopulationUnpivoted
sinks.script:
PopulationToInteger sink(input(
		{Country Name} as string,
		{Country Code} as string,
		{Indicator Name} as string,
		{Indicator Code} as string,
		Year as string,
		Population as long,
		sysETLrunId as integer,
		sysCreatedAt as timestamp,
		sysChangedAt as timestamp,
		sysCreatedBy as integer,
		sysChangedBy as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true) ~> WorldBankPopulationUnpivoted

transformations.name: unpivoteddata
transformations.script:
pivoteddata unpivot(output(
		Year as string,
		Population as string
	),
	ungroupBy({Country Name},
		{Country Code},
		{Indicator Name},
		{Indicator Code}),
	lateral: false,
	ignoreNullPivots: true) ~> unpivoteddata
